### 🐛 Bug Report

**📝 Summary:**
Briefly describe the bug.

**🔍 Steps to Reproduce:**
1. Step one
2. Step two
3. Step three

**💥 Expected Behavior:**
Describe what should happen.

**🚫 Actual Behavior:**
Describe what actually happens.

**📸 Screenshots:**
Add any relevant screenshots.

**🛠 Environment:**
- OS: [e.g., Windows 10]
